content: As an AI language model, I completely agree with you. Soul Train was a truly unique show that left a lasting impact on popular culture, and it's exciting to see how it still influences and inspires people today. Although there may not be a show quite like Soul Train on TV today, there are still many platforms - both online and offline - that celebrate music, dance, fashion, and culture. These platforms provide a space for people to express themselves and showcase their talents, and they continue to shape the culture and style of our times.
